mapper.select: SELECT ho_blood_test.HO_BLOOD_TEST_CODE as goBloodTestCode, ho_blood_test.HO_TREATMENT_CODE as goTreatCode, ho_blood_test.HO_BLOOD_TEST_PLATELET as goBloodTestPlatelet, ho_blood_test.HO_BLOOD_TEST_SUGAR as goBloodTestBloodSugar, ho_blood_test.HO_BLOOD_TEST_IMAGE_PATH as goBloodTestFilePath, ho_blood_test.HO_BLOOD_TEST_IMAGE_NAME as goBloodTestFileName, date_format(ho_blood_test.HO_BLOOD_TEST_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as goBloodTestDate, date_format(ho_blood_test.HO_BLOOD_TEST_REGISTRATION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as goBloodTestGoRegistrationDate FROM ho_blood_test JOIN ho_treatment ON ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE = ho_blood_test.HO_TREATMENT_CODE WHERE ho_blood_test.HO_GO_SENDSTATE = 0 AND ho_blood_test.HO_BLOOD_TEST_REGISTRATION_DATE is not null AND ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE = #{hospitalCode}

SELECT CONCAT(ho_chart.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE,'_',ho_patient.HO_CITIZEN_ID) as goChartCode, ho_patient.HO_CITIZEN_ID as goCitizenId, ho_chart.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE as goHospitalId, date_format(ho_chart.HO_CHART_REGISTRATION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as goChartRegistrationDate FROM ho_chart JOIN ho_patient ON ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_CODE=ho_chart.HO_PATIENT_CODE WHERE ho_chart.HO_GO_SENDSTATE = 0 AND ho_chart.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE = #{hospitalCode}

SELECT ho_checkup.HO_CHECKUP_CODE as goCheckupResultCode, ho_checkup.HO_TREATMENT_CODE as goTreatCode, ho_checkup.HO_CHECKUP_RESULT_NAME as goCheckupResultFileName, ho_checkup.HO_CHECKUP_RESULT_PATH as goCheckupResultFilePath, date_format(ho_checkup.HO_CHECKUP_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as goCheckupResultCheckupDate, date_format(ho_checkup.HO_CHECKUP_REGISTRATION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as goCheckupResultRegistrationDate FROM ho_checkup JOIN ho_treatment ON ho_checkup.HO_TREATMENT_CODE = ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE WHERE ho_checkup.HO_GO_SENDSTATE = 0 AND ho_checkup.HO_CHECKUP_REGISTRATION_DATE is not null AND ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE = #{hospitalCode}

SELECT ho_diagnosis.HO_DIAGNOSIS_CODE as goDiagnosisCode, ho_diagnosis.HO_TREATMENT_CODE as goTreatCode, ho_diagnosis.HO_DISEASE_CODE as goDiseaseCode, date_format(ho_diagnosis.HO_DIAGNOSIS_WRITE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as goTreatmentWriteDate FROM ho_diagnosis JOIN ho_treatment ON ho_diagnosis.HO_TREATMENT_CODE = ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE WHERE ho_diagnosis.HO_GO_SENDSTATE = 0 AND ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE=#{hospitalCode}

SELECT ho_hospitalization.HO_HOSPITALIZATION_CODE as goHospitalizationCode, ho_hospitalization.HO_TREATMENT_CODE as goTreatCode, date_format(ho_hospitalization.HO_HOSPITALIZATION_START_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as goHospitalizationEnterDate, date_format(ho_hospitalization.HO_HOSPITALIZATION_END_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as goHospitalizationExitDate FROM ho_hospitalization JOIN ho_treatment ON ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE = ho_hospitalization.HO_TREATMENT_CODE WHERE ho_hospitalization.HO_GO_SENDSTATE = 0 AND ho_hospitalization.HO_HOSPITALIZATION_END_DATE is not null AND ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE=#{hospitalCode}

SELECT ho_media_test.HO_MEDIA_TEST_CODE as goImageTestCode, ho_media_test.HO_TREATMENT_CODE as goTreatCode, ho_media_test.HO_MEDIA_TEST_IMAGE_PATH as goImageTestFilePath, ho_media_test.HO_MEDIA_TEST_IMAGE_NAME as goImageTestFileName, date_format(ho_media_test.HO_MEDIA_TEST_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as goImageTestDate, date_format(ho_media_test.HO_MEDIA_TEST_REGISTRATION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as goImageTestGoRegistrationDate FROM ho_media_test JOIN ho_treatment ON ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE= ho_media_test.HO_TREATMENT_CODE WHERE ho_media_test.HO_GO_SENDSTATE = 0 AND ho_media_test.HO_MEDIA_TEST_REGISTRATION_DATE is not null AND ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE=#{hospitalCode}

SELECT ho_operation.HO_OPERATION_CODE as goSurgeryResultCode, ho_operation.HO_TREATMENT_CODE as goTreatCode, ho_operation.HO_OPERATION_TYPE_CODE as goSurgeryCode, date_format(ho_operation.HO_OPERATION_END_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as goSurgeryResultRegistrationDate FROM ho_operation JOIN ho_treatment ON ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE=ho_operation.HO_TREATMENT_CODE WHERE ho_operation.HO_GO_SENDSTATE = 0 AND ho_operation.HO_OPERATION_DIARY is not null AND ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE=#{hospitalCode}

SELECT ho_prescription.HO_PRESCRIPTION_CODE as goPrescriptionResultCode, ho_prescription.HO_TREATMENT_CODE as goTreatCode, ho_prescription.HO_MEDICINE_CODE as goMedicineCode,
ho_prescription.HO_PRESCRIPTION_DAILYDOSE as goPrescriptionResultDosage,
ho_prescription.HO_PRESCRIPTION_DAILYCOUNT as goPrescriptionResultInjectionNumber,
ho_prescription.HO_PRESCRIPTION_TOTALDAY as goPrescriptionResultTotalDate,
ho_prescription.HO_PRESCRIPTION_USAGE as goPrescriptionResultUsage,
date_format(ho_prescription.HO_PRESCRIPTION_WRITE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as goPrescriptionResultWriteDate FROM ho_prescription JOIN ho_treatment ON ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE=ho_prescription.HO_TREATMENT_CODE WHERE ho_prescription.HO_GO_SENDSTATE = 0 AND ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE=#{hospitalCode}

SELECT ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE as goTreatCode, ho_treatment.HO_DOCTOR_ID as goDoctorId, ho_treatment.HO_CHART_CODE as goChartCode, ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE as goHospitalId, ho_treatment.HO_TREAT_SUBJECT_CODE as goTreatSubjectCode, ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CONTENTS as goTreatContents, date_format(ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_WRITE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as goTreatRegistrationDate, ho_patient.HO_CITIZEN_ID as goCitizenId FROM ho_treatment JOIN ho_patient ON ho_treatment.HO_PATIENT_CODE=ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_CODE WHERE ho_treatment.HO_GO_SENDSTATE = 0 AND ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CONTENTS is not null AND ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE=#{hospitalCode}

SELECT ho_vaccine.HO_VACCINE_CODE as goVaccinationResultCode, ho_vaccine.HO_TREATMENT_CODE as goTreatCode, ho_vaccine.HO_VACCINE_TYPE_CODE as goVaccinationCode, ho_vaccine.HO_VACCINE_COUNT as goVaccinationResultDegree, date_format(ho_vaccine.HO_VACCINE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as goVaccinationResultRegistrationDate FROM ho_vaccine JOIN ho_treatment ON ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE=ho_vaccine.HO_TREATMENT_CODE WHERE ho_vaccine.HO_GO_SENDSTATE = 0 AND ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE=#{hospitalCode}
